downtown-office-renovation.title: Downtown Office Tower Renovation
downtown-office-renovation.challenge: Modernize a 15-story office building's interior while maintaining daily operations with 200+ employees.
downtown-office-renovation.solution: Implemented a phased, after-hours approach using low-VOC materials for occupied spaces.
results: 30% reduction in energy costs with new coatings

testimonial.quote: Ascen Group transformed our workspace without missing a beat. Their after-hours team was professional, efficient, and the results exceeded our expectations.
testimonial.author: Sarah Johnson
testimonial.title: Facilities Manager, TechCorp Inc.

downtown-office-renovation.details: This comprehensive renovation included painting all common areas, conference rooms, and private offices across 15 floors. The project required careful coordination with building management to minimize tenant disruption.

luxury-condo-restoration.title: Luxury Condo Complex Restoration
luxury-condo-restoration.challenge: Restore exterior stucco and EIFS on a 25-year-old luxury condominium complex while residents remained in their homes.
luxury-condo-restoration.solution: Developed a unit-by-unit schedule with resident coordination and implemented complete weatherproofing during work.
results: Extended building envelope life by 20+ years

testimonial.quote: The team was respectful of our residents and maintained excellent communication throughout. The building looks brand new.
testimonial.author: Michael Chen
testimonial.title: Condo Board President

luxury-condo-restoration.details: The project involved repairing and refinishing all exterior stucco and EIFS surfaces, addressing water damage, and implementing a new weather barrier system.
